name: average lifespan of a good bird: lovign life
name_original: average lifespan of a good bird: lovign life
description:
WARNING: NOT GOOD! YOU CAN PLAY IT BUT IT LOOKS BAD HAS NO SOUND AND IS SORT OF BROKEN THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

try to get a high scos

jumping makes you poop and stop getting scos

holding shift and left or right makes you cough and stop getting scos

doing both at once makes you lose scos

both can kill the gubbins but nothing can kill the hurtful words

:,(

dont get a negative scos

contrails

left = left

right = right

space = jump/poop

shift + directional = cough

find some way to contact me and tell em your high scos if you want

me: 1000 scos

"big d": 700 scos
